email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, available for a laycan of October 15-20. The vessel has a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280 meters. Our starting freight quote is in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Could you consider something in the mid-40s, say $45.50 per metric ton? Also, could you confirm the vessel’s specifications and any demurrage terms? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your reply. I understand your position on the freight rate, but $45.50 is a bit tight given current market conditions. How about we meet in the middle at $48.00 per metric ton? The MV Ocean Star is in excellent condition, and I’ve attached the full specs for your review. Demurrage is set at $20,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the follow-up. $48.00 is still a bit high for us, but we can consider it if you can reduce the demurrage rate to $18,000 per day. Also, can you confirm the laytime window? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I appreciate your flexibility. We can agree to $18,000 per day for demurrage. The laytime window is 72 hours total, starting from the vessel’s arrival at the load port. If this works for you, I’ll draft the charter party agreement. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, that sounds good. Let’s proceed with the freight rate at $48.00 per metric ton and demurrage at $18,000 per day. Please send over the draft agreement, and we’ll review it promptly. Thanks for your help. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear! I’ll prepare the draft agreement and send it over by end of day. Thanks for your cooperation, and I look forward to finalizing this shipment. Best regards, Sarah
